name: Stick Adventurer
description:
Minimalist rogue-like platformer in which you explore a dungeon to save princesses and retrieve lost artefacts for the King.

  • Fight with or run from the monsters of the dungeon.
  • Can unlock more weapons and double/triple jumps with XP and gold.
  • Retrieve the ULTIMATE GAUNTLET! to save the world.

As you take damage you will lose your abilities which can then be restored with health potions.
